name: adaptive-subagents
description: Optimize token cost by routing all actionable work to the cheapest model tier that satisfies quality. Delegates mechanical lookups to Haiku, implementation/comprehension to Sonnet, and architecture/security to Opus.

hooks.prompt:
A subagent just completed. Log this delegation to routing-log.md (do not delegate this logging step).

If routing-log.md does not exist yet, create it with the Write tool:
| Model | Category | Cost | Task |
|-------|----------|------|------|

Then append one row using Edit (Read the file first if you haven't already):
| {model} | {category} | {1x/3x/15x} | {brief task description} |

Haiku=1x, Sonnet=3x, Opus=15x. If logging fails for any reason, continue to the next step â€” do not retry or block.
